reviewText: I have always loved her work
Lilias Folan is the absolute best.  I have done her tapes for years and even took a week with her in Montana.  Love the tapes.
The disk had a flaw in it, but not too bad.  Since I had done yoga with her before, I was familiar with the section that was flawed.
Great
Love Lilias Yoga!
Lilias is great! This is a wonderful DVD for women who are aging and losing flexibility.
Not as strenuous as her old program but enjoy this one as well.

Between AM & PM Yoga Workouts for Seniors and this tape, I am gradually improving. I love that she is a senior and knows the limitations of seniors and helps us to stretch ourselves and be see limited.
too much new age stuff to suit me....I just wanted simple basic yoga moves for seniors
great exercise for older people. AAA+++++

Nice to see Lilias again, so many years after her PBS program. This is a super simple program for beginners and out of shape people. A companion piece for a book she mentions in the video. We didn't get the book.
I always like Lilias

love her
not quite ready for the senior video
been using her "beginners basics" for 30 years !!!!
Use it every day ... certain video chapters in it.
Not at all what I expected....not really a yoga work out.  I donated it to the local library.  I have several of her Tapes that I love.

This is an excellent Yoga DVD for beginners and seniors.  The level of difficulty is just right for beginners, seniors, and people that have not been doing Yoga for several years.  I recommend this Yoga Program for beginners and seniors.
I love Lilias and I am replacing my vcr tapes with dvds.
Good for seniors. The right pace. I feel good when I do it.
Don't waste your money
It was a gift and the recipient was pleased.
Used one of her products many years ago, lost  it when I relocated years ago. Extremely easy to follow,
